citations.narrative:
*** The rabbit cages have an excess accumulation of excreta and there is a noticeable ammonia odor in the room.
For the health and comfort of the animals this situation should be corrected.
Correct immediately.
An exit interview was conducted with the licensee on 8/20/2014
